text: The Visions of Iddo the Seer is a lost text that was probably written by the biblical prophet Iddo, who lived at the time of Rehoboam. The book is described at : It is also mentioned in relating to Rehoboam and relating to Abijah. == See also == * Books of the Bible * Lost work * Non-canonical books referenced in the Bible Category:Lost Jewish texts Category:Books of Chronicles
title: Visions of Iddo the Seer
